1.0.0.name: wordpress/share-juice
1.0.0.description: It is very simple to use this plugin. After installation, go to Share Juice->Social Buttons and start creating the buttons with your preferred configurations. At the end of each button there is link which take you to the individual site. Choose location where each button will be shown. Use global options to define which share button group you want to be visible on main blog. Thats it More documentation at Webtecho.com
